about_the_game:
Lazy Climbers is a cooperative multiplayer platform game, invite your friends and climb up to the highest peak together!

With no restriction on the number of players in one room, as long as your computer can afford, it's not a dream to have hundreds of people in the same game!

Levels with different and unique styles

The level will start from a cave, where the players move towards the light, and then what comes is the endless sea.


You may fall three thousand feet at any time, no matter, keep climbing until reaching a place higher than the sky!

What if the game is too hard and your friends are lagging behind? It is your show time.

At certain points, players may encounter the magic stone. Players can use it to create a doppelganger who would generate a magic pad. Go back to help your friends by using the doppelganger and build an easier path for them with your magic pad.
Always remember that to help others is to help yourself. If you accidentally fall back to the original, you'll know how easy the path could be with all the magic pads have been placed before.

Always fail?

C'est la vie! Cheer up and keep chasing the others!

About this game and the developers

We are a small team of two people, both of whom are working on a large commercialized game project. Long-term overtime and the complex office environment have led us to a decreasing love for games. Just as we were about to give up, we happened to talk about our original passion for game. We realized that the true passion for game and making game is not necessarily have to make profit-rolling project. What we want is to make sth fun and created from our hearts.
So we hit it off, formed a small team of two, and developed this game "Lazy Climbers" together in our spare time after work.
This game is expected to drive you crazy, but we hope that you will be able to start again and again with the encouragement and support from your friends, just as we did to each other.

short_description: Lazy Climbers is a very difficult platform game with dangers lurking everywhere. You may fall back to the origin at anytime. Can't leap over anymore? Call your friends for help. We have no limit on the number of people online in the room, all your friends can come and suffer together!
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
